Package View_Controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddPart_ViewController
    FXML Controller class for the add part view, has format and bounds checking functionality also forces user to confirm when they click the cancel button which gives the user the option to save work if the button is clicked by mistake.
    AddProduct_ViewController
    FXML Controller class for the add product view, has bounds and format checking for input and makes user confirm cancel A runtime error I encountered in this controller class was in the changeScreen method.
    Main_viewController
    FXML for the main view scene, contains delete functionality and can change scenes for add and modify.
    ModifyPart_ViewController
    FXML Controller class for the modify part view, auto fills the text fields with the selected parts data and performs format and bounds checks A logical error that I encountered while coding this controller class was in the Initialize method.
    ModifyProduct_ViewController
    FXML Controller class for the Modify Product View, loads the products associated parts and fills in all the text fields with the products details A runtime error that was corrected in this controller class was in the changeScreen method.
